description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dominate the galaxy in this unusual multiplayer twin-stick shooter.  Destroy your enemies, take their clusters and navigate cosmic dangers across a wide variety of levels and game modes.  Improve your skills in the co-op campaign then take the fight online to prove who is the Cluster Master!
description.short: Dominate the galaxy in this unusual multiplayer twin-stick shooter.  Destroy your enemies, take their clusters and navigate cosmic dangers across a wide variety of levels and game modes.
